v8:item.v8:content: Concurrence is required standard button group
Concurrence is required standard button group

Settings.QueryText: SELECT ALLOWED EDStates.ObjectReference AS Document, DATETIME(2012, 1, 1) AS Date, VALUE(Catalog.Companies.EmptyRef) AS Company, VALUE(Catalog.Companies.EmptyRef) AS Counterparty, 0 AS DocumentAmount FROM InformationRegister.EDStates AS EDStates WHERE EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.NotFormed)

SELECT ALLOWED EDPackage.Ref AS Package, EDPackage.Company AS Company, EDPackage.Counterparty AS Counterparty, EDPackage.PackageStatus AS Status, EDPackage.Date AS Date, EDAttachedFiles.Responsible FROM Document.EDPackage AS EDPackage LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles ON EDPackage.Ref = EDAttachedFiles.FileOwner WHERE EDPackage.DeletionMark = FALSE AND EDPackage.Direction = VALUE(Enum.EDDirections.Outgoing) AND EDPackage.PackageStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDPackagesStatuses.PreparedToSending) AND Not EDPackage.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughBankWebSource)

SELECT ALLOWED DISTINCT EDStates.ElectronicDocument, EDStates.EDVersionState, EDStates.ActionsFromOurSide, EDStates.ActionsFromOtherPartySide, EDAttachedFiles.EDKind, EDAttachedFiles.AdditionalInformation, EDAttachedFiles.CreationDate AS Date, EDAttachedFiles.EDDirection, EDAttachedFiles.DocumentAmount, EDAttachedFiles.Responsible, EDAttachedFiles.Company, EDAttachedFiles.Counterparty, CAST(EDAttachedFiles.RejectionReason AS String(100)) AS RejectionReason, CAST(EDAttachedFiles.Definition AS String(255)) AS Definition FROM InformationRegister.EDStates AS EDStates LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles ON EDStates.ElectronicDocument = EDAttachedFiles.Ref WHERE EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.OnApproval) AND Not EDAttachedFiles.EDFProfileSettings.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughBankWebSource)

SELECT ALLOWED DISTINCT EnclQuery.ElectronicDocument, EDAttachedFiles.EDKind, EDAttachedFiles.AdditionalInformation, EDAttachedFiles.CreationDate AS Date, EDAttachedFiles.EDDirection, EDAttachedFiles.DocumentAmount, EDAttachedFiles.Responsible, EDAttachedFiles.Company, EDAttachedFiles.Counterparty, CAST(EDAttachedFiles.RejectionReason AS String(100)) AS RejectionReason, CAST(EDAttachedFiles.Definition AS String(255)) AS Definition FROM (SELECT EDAttachedFiles.Ref AS ElectronicDocument FROM InformationRegister.EDStates AS EDStates LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles ON EDStates.ElectronicDocument = EDAttachedFiles.Ref WHERE EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.OnSigning) AND EDAttachedFiles.EDKind <> VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.RandomED) AND Not EDAttachedFiles.EDFProfileSettings.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughBankWebSource)
UNION ALL
SELECT EDAttachedFiles.Ref FROM Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles WHERE EDAttachedFiles.FileOwner In (SELECT DISTINCT EDStates.ObjectReference FROM InformationRegister.EDStates AS EDStates WHERE EDStates.ActionsFromOurSide = VALUE(Enum.EDConsolidatedStates.ActionsNeeded)) AND EDAttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.NotificationAboutReception) AND EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.Approved)
UNION ALL
SELECT EDAttachedFiles.Ref FROM Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDUsageAgreements.OutgoingDocuments AS EDApprovalsOutgoingDocuments ON EDAttachedFiles.EDAgreement = EDApprovalsOutgoingDocuments.Ref AND (EDApprovalsOutgoingDocuments.OutgoingDocument = EDAttachedFiles.EDKind) INNER JOIN Document.RandomED AS RandomED ON EDAttachedFiles.FileOwner = RandomED.Ref INNER JOIN Catalog.EDUsageAgreements AS EDUsageAgreements ON EDAttachedFiles.EDAgreement = EDUsageAgreements.Ref WHERE EDAttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.RandomED) AND CASE WHEN EDAttachedFiles.EDDirection = VALUE(Enum.EDDirections.Incoming) THEN (EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.Received) OR EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.PreparedToSending)) AND RandomED.ConfirmationRequired ELSE (EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.Created) OR EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.Approved) OR EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.PreparedToSending)) AND (EDAttachedFiles.EDFProfileSettings.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughEDFOperatorTaxcom) OR EDApprovalsOutgoingDocuments.ToForm AND EDApprovalsOutgoingDocuments.UseDS) END AND Not EDAttachedFiles.DeletionMark) AS EnclQuery LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles ON EnclQuery.ElectronicDocument = EDAttachedFiles.Ref

SELECT ALLOWED DISTINCT EnclQuery.ElectronicDocument, EDAttachedFiles.EDKind, EDAttachedFiles.AdditionalInformation, EDAttachedFiles.CreationDate AS Date, EDAttachedFiles.EDDirection, EDAttachedFiles.DocumentAmount, EDAttachedFiles.Responsible, EDAttachedFiles.Company, EDAttachedFiles.Counterparty, EnclQuery.EDVersionState, CAST(EDAttachedFiles.RejectionReason AS String(100)) AS RejectionReason, CAST(EDAttachedFiles.Definition AS String(255)) AS Definition FROM (SELECT EDStates.ElectronicDocument AS ElectronicDocument, EDStates.EDVersionState AS EDVersionState FROM Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles INNER JOIN InformationRegister.EDStates AS EDStates ON (EDStates.ElectronicDocument = EDAttachedFiles.Ref) WHERE Not(EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.Rejected) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.ExchangeCompleted) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.SendingExpected) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.ConfirmationExpected) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.NotificationExpected) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.OperatorConfirmationExpected) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.OperatorTransferExpecting) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.SendingToRecipientExpected) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.NotificationAboutReceivingExpected) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.CorrectionExpected) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.Canceled) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.CancellationExpected) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.NotFormed)) AND EDAttachedFiles.EDKind <> VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.RandomED) AND Not EDAttachedFiles.EDFProfileSettings.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughBankWebSource)
UNION ALL
SELECT EDAttachedFiles.Ref, EDStates.EDVersionState FROM Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.EDStates AS EDStates ON (EDStates.ObjectReference = EDAttachedFiles.FileOwner) WHERE EDAttachedFiles.FileOwner In (SELECT DISTINCT EDStates.ObjectReference FROM InformationRegister.EDStates AS EDStates WHERE EDStates.ActionsFromOurSide = VALUE(Enum.EDConsolidatedStates.ActionsNeeded)) AND EDAttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.NotificationAboutReception) AND EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.Approved) AND Not EDAttachedFiles.EDFProfileSettings.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughBankWebSource)
UNION ALL
SELECT EDAttachedFiles.Ref, VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.EmptyRef) FROM Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDUsageAgreements.OutgoingDocuments AS EDApprovalsOutgoingDocuments ON EDAttachedFiles.EDAgreement = EDApprovalsOutgoingDocuments.Ref AND (EDApprovalsOutgoingDocuments.OutgoingDocument = EDAttachedFiles.EDKind) INNER JOIN Document.RandomED AS RandomED ON EDAttachedFiles.FileOwner = RandomED.Ref INNER JOIN Catalog.EDUsageAgreements AS EDUsageAgreements ON EDAttachedFiles.EDAgreement = EDUsageAgreements.Ref WHERE EDAttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.RandomED) AND CASE WHEN EDAttachedFiles.EDDirection = VALUE(Enum.EDDirections.Incoming) THEN (EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.Received) OR EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.PreparedToSending)) AND RandomED.ConfirmationRequired ELSE (EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.NotSent) OR EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.PreparedToSending)) AND (EDAttachedFiles.EDFProfileSettings.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughEDFOperatorTaxcom) OR EDApprovalsOutgoingDocuments.ToForm AND EDApprovalsOutgoingDocuments.UseDS) END AND Not EDAttachedFiles.DeletionMark) AS EnclQuery LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles ON EnclQuery.ElectronicDocument = EDAttachedFiles.Ref

SELECT ALLOWED DISTINCT EnclQuery.ElectronicDocument, EDAttachedFiles.EDKind, EDAttachedFiles.AdditionalInformation, EDAttachedFiles.EDDirection, EDAttachedFiles.DocumentAmount, EDAttachedFiles.Responsible, EDAttachedFiles.Company, EDAttachedFiles.Counterparty, EnclQuery.EDVersionState, EnclQuery.ActionsFromOurSide, EnclQuery.ActionsFromOtherPartySide, EnclQuery.Number, EnclQuery.Date, CAST(EDAttachedFiles.RejectionReason AS String(100)) AS RejectionReason, CAST(EDAttachedFiles.Definition AS String(255)) AS Definition FROM (SELECT EDStates.ElectronicDocument AS ElectronicDocument, EDStates.ActionsFromOurSide AS ActionsFromOurSide, EDStates.ActionsFromOtherPartySide AS ActionsFromOtherPartySide, EDStates.EDVersionState AS EDVersionState, EDAttachedFiles.SenderDocumentNumber AS Number, EDAttachedFiles.EDStatusChangeDate AS Date FROM InformationRegister.EDStates AS EDStates LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles ON EDStates.ElectronicDocument = EDAttachedFiles.Ref WHERE Not(EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.Rejected) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.ExchangeCompleted) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.TransferError) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.ClosedForce) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.CancellationRequired) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.Canceled)) AND EDStates.ActionsFromOurSide = VALUE(Enum.EDConsolidatedStates.NoActionsNeeded) AND EDAttachedFiles.EDKind <> VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.RandomED) AND Not EDAttachedFiles.EDFProfileSettings.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughBankWebSource)
UNION ALL
SELECT EDAttachedFiles.Ref, VALUE(Enum.EDConsolidatedStates.EmptyRef), VALUE(Enum.EDConsolidatedStates.EmptyRef), VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.EmptyRef), EDAttachedFiles.SenderDocumentNumber, EDAttachedFiles.EDStatusChangeDate FROM Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles INNER JOIN Document.RandomED AS RandomED ON EDAttachedFiles.FileOwner = RandomED.Ref INNER JOIN Catalog.EDUsageAgreements AS EDUsageAgreements ON EDAttachedFiles.EDAgreement = EDUsageAgreements.Ref WHERE EDAttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.RandomED) AND Not EDAttachedFiles.EDFProfileSettings.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughBankWebSource) AND Not EDAttachedFiles.DeletionMark AND EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus <> VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.Rejected) AND EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus <> VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.RejectedByReceiver) AND CASE WHEN EDAttachedFiles.EDDirection = VALUE(Enum.EDDirections.Incoming) THEN Not RandomED.WasRead ELSE CASE WHEN RandomED.ConfirmationRequired THEN EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus <> VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.ConfirmationReceived) ELSE EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus <> VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.Sent) END END) AS EnclQuery LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles ON EnclQuery.ElectronicDocument = EDAttachedFiles.Ref

SELECT ALLOWED EDPackage.Ref AS Package, EDPackage.Company AS Company, EDPackage.Counterparty AS Counterparty, EDPackage.PackageStatus AS Status, EDPackage.Date AS Date, EDAttachedFiles.Responsible, EDAttachedFiles.EDKind, EDAttachedFiles.EDDirection FROM Document.EDPackage AS EDPackage LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles ON EDPackage.Ref = EDAttachedFiles.FileOwner WHERE EDPackage.DeletionMark = FALSE AND EDPackage.Direction = VALUE(Enum.EDDirections.Incoming) AND EDPackage.PackageStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDPackagesStatuses.ToUnpacking) AND Not EDPackage.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughBankWebSource)

SELECT ALLOWED EDPackage.Ref AS Package, EDPackage.Company AS Company, EDPackage.PackageStatus AS Status, EDPackage.Date AS Date, EDAttachedFiles.Responsible, EDAttachedFiles.EDKind, EDAttachedFiles.EDDirection FROM Document.EDPackage AS EDPackage LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles ON EDPackage.Ref = EDAttachedFiles.FileOwner WHERE EDPackage.DeletionMark = FALSE AND EDPackage.Direction = VALUE(Enum.EDDirections.Incoming) AND EDPackage.PackageStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDPackagesStatuses.Unknown) AND Not EDPackage.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughBankWebSource)

SELECT ALLOWED EDStates.ElectronicDocument, EDAttachedFiles.EDKind, EDAttachedFiles.AdditionalInformation, EDAttachedFiles.CreationDate AS Date, EDAttachedFiles.EDDirection, EDAttachedFiles.DocumentAmount, EDAttachedFiles.Responsible, EDAttachedFiles.Company, EDAttachedFiles.Counterparty, CAST(EDAttachedFiles.RejectionReason AS String(100)) AS RejectionReason, CAST(EDAttachedFiles.Definition AS String(1024)) AS Definition FROM InformationRegister.EDStates AS EDStates LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles ON EDStates.ElectronicDocument = EDAttachedFiles.Ref WHERE (EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.TransferError) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.DocumentClarificationNeeded)) AND Not EDAttachedFiles.EDFProfileSettings.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughBankWebSource)

SELECT ALLOWED DISTINCT EDUsageAgreements.ConnectionStatus, EDUsageAgreements.Counterparty, EDUsageAgreements.Company, EDUsageAgreements.Ref, EDUsageAgreements.ErrorDescription AS AdditionalInformation FROM Catalog.EDUsageAgreements AS EDUsageAgreements WHERE (NOT EDUsageAgreements.DeletionMark AND (EDUsageAgreements.ConnectionStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMemberStatuses.InvitationRequired) OR EDUsageAgreements.ConnectionStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMemberStatuses.AgreementExpectation) OR EDUsageAgreements.ConnectionStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMemberStatuses.ApprovalRequired) OR EDUsageAgreements.ConnectionStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMemberStatuses.Error)))

SELECT ALLOWED DISTINCT EDUsageAgreements.ConnectionStatus, EDUsageAgreements.Counterparty AS Recipient, EDUsageAgreements.Company AS Sender, EDUsageAgreements.Ref, EDUsageAgreements.EDFProfileSettings, CAST(EDUsageAgreements.CounterpartyID AS String(50)) AS CounterpartyID, CAST(EDUsageAgreements.EmailForInvitation AS String(30)) AS Email, CAST(EDUsageAgreements.InvitationText AS String(100)) AS InvitationText, EDUsageAgreements.ErrorDescription AS AdditionalInformation FROM Catalog.EDUsageAgreements AS EDUsageAgreements WHERE Not EDUsageAgreements.DeletionMark AND (EDUsageAgreements.ConnectionStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMemberStatuses.InvitationRequired) OR EDUsageAgreements.ConnectionStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMemberStatuses.Error))

SELECT ALLOWED DISTINCT EDUsageAgreements.ConnectionStatus, EDUsageAgreements.Counterparty AS Sender, EDUsageAgreements.Company AS Recipient, EDUsageAgreements.Ref, EDUsageAgreements.EDFProfileSettings, CAST(EDUsageAgreements.CounterpartyID AS String(50)) AS SenderID, CAST(EDUsageAgreements.EmailForInvitation AS String(40)) AS Email FROM Catalog.EDUsageAgreements AS EDUsageAgreements WHERE Not EDUsageAgreements.DeletionMark AND EDUsageAgreements.ConnectionStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMemberStatuses.ApprovalRequired)

SELECT ALLOWED DISTINCT EDUsageAgreements.ConnectionStatus, EDUsageAgreements.Counterparty AS Recipient, EDUsageAgreements.Company AS Sender, EDUsageAgreements.Ref, EDUsageAgreements.EDFProfileSettings, CAST(EDUsageAgreements.CounterpartyID AS String(50)) AS CounterpartyID, CAST(EDUsageAgreements.EmailForInvitation AS String(30)) AS Email FROM Catalog.EDUsageAgreements AS EDUsageAgreements WHERE Not EDUsageAgreements.DeletionMark AND EDUsageAgreements.ConnectionStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMemberStatuses.AgreementExpectation)

SELECT ALLOWED DISTINCT EDAttachedFiles.Ref, NestedSelect.EDVersionState, NestedSelect.ActionsFromOurSide, NestedSelect.ActionsFromOtherPartySide, EDAttachedFiles.EDKind, EDAttachedFiles.AdditionalInformation, EDAttachedFiles.CreationDate AS Date, EDAttachedFiles.EDDirection, EDAttachedFiles.DocumentAmount, EDAttachedFiles.Responsible, EDAttachedFiles.Company, EDAttachedFiles.Counterparty, CAST(EDAttachedFiles.RejectionReason AS String(100)) AS RejectionReason, CAST(EDAttachedFiles.Definition AS String(255)) AS Definition FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ISNULL(EDAttachedFiles.Ref, EDSubordinate.Ref) AS ElectronicDocument, EDStates.EDVersionState AS EDVersionState, EDStates.ActionsFromOurSide AS ActionsFromOurSide, EDStates.ActionsFromOtherPartySide AS ActionsFromOtherPartySide FROM InformationRegister.EDStates AS EDStates LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDSubordinate LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles ON (EDAttachedFiles.Ref = EDSubordinate.ElectronicDocumentOwner) ON EDStates.ElectronicDocument = EDSubordinate.Ref WHERE EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.CancellationRequired) AND Not EDSubordinate.EDFProfileSettings.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughBankWebSource)) AS NestedSelect LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles ON (EDAttachedFiles.Ref = NestedSelect.ElectronicDocument)

v8:item.v8:content: Set the "Approved" status for the electronic document
Sign up the marked electronic documents
Set status canceled for selected packages
Установить статус отменен для выделенных пакетов
Set status canceled for selected packages
Установить статус отменен для выделенных пакетов
Set status canceled for selected packages
Установить статус отменен для выделенных пакетов
Change the person responsible for processing for the selected electronic documents
Изпенить ответственного за обработку для выделенных электронных документов
Open an ITS item on 1C:Connect service
Открыть статью на ИТС по сервису 1С-Бухфон
